attributes.action: The Abolition of Postal Voting in Accordance with Article 21(3) of the UNITED NATIONS Universal Declaration of Human Rights.
attributes.additional_details: I, the undersigned propose the abolition of the Postal Vote in accordance with Article 21 (3) of the UNITED NATIONS  Universal Declaration of Human Rights! The Article clearly states that all elections should be held in secrecy & be of equal suffrage. Postal Voting violates these fundamental principles & is open to widespread electoral fraud & coercion. Every voter (able or disabled) must vote at the polling station!
